channel.title: [ERROR] Error with a command I need [ERROR]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/urghhhh.jpg[/img]
I get this error when compiling my new command.
I go into command.java, add the following code [code] } if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+"");[/code]
And get that ruddy error... I'm using Richscape V4.2 if it helps.
Please can someone help me out with this...

item.title: [ERROR] Error with a command I need [ERROR]
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

I did think it would be something like that, how would I go about finding them or is there just some things you cant know?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2009, 02:37:06 pm[/size][hr]Ive changed it slightly now, here is what I have now

if(cmd.startsWith("mypos")){ c.Send("AbsX +absX+ "); c.Send("AbsY +absY+ "); }

The only problem now is when I do the command I get the following

AbsX +absX+
AbsY +absY+

Read full topic
item.source: [ERROR] Error with a command I need [ERROR]

item.title: [ERROR] Error with a command I need [ERROR]
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:268930”]None of those variables match RichScape’s variables.[/quote]That ^^

Find the right variable names, replace the wrong ones, you’ll fix those errors.

Read full topic
